# op decoder
0000011001 000011000010011010 # 1 LOAD
0000011010 000011010000011000 # 2 LOAD
0000011011 001011001101011000 # 3 LOAD

0010011001 000010000010000010 # 1 OP-IMM
0010011010 001010000001000000 # 2 OP-IMM

0010111001 000001000000000000 # 1 AUIPC
0010111010 001001000001000000 # 2 AUIPC

0011011001 000010000010000010 # 1 OP-IMM-32
0011011010 001010000001000000 # 2 OP-IMM-32

0100011001 000011000010000010 # 1 STORE
0100011010 000011010010100100 # 2 STORE
0100011011 001011000100000000 # 3 STORE

0110011001 000110000010000010 # 1 OP
0110011010 000110000010100100 # 2 OP
0110011011 001110000001000000 # 3 OP

0110111001 001000000001010000 # 1 LUI

1100011001 000001000010000010 # 1 BRANCH
1100011010 000001100010100100 # 2 BRANCH
1100011011 011001100000000000 # 3 BRANCH

1100111001 000010000010001010 # 1 JALR
1100111010 011010000001001000 # 2 JALR

1101111001 000001000000001000 # 1 JAL
1101111010 011001000001001000 # 2 JAL

1110011xxx 100000000000000000 # xxx SYSTEM

xxxxxxx000 000000001100000001 # 0 INSTR
